abstract: Victorio Maximiliano "Maxi" Pereira Páez (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈmaksi peˈrejra]; born 8 June 1984) is an Uruguayan professional footballer who plays for S.L. Benfica in the Portuguese first division, as a right defender.Pereira played with Defensor in Uruguay, joining Benfica in 2007 and going on to remain with the club for several seasons, appearing in nearly 300 official games and winning six major titles.A Uruguayan international on more than 90 occasions, Pereira represented the nation in two World Cups and as many Copa América tournaments.
